name: Custom Handmade Etched Copper Dog ID Tag - Starlite Design
description:
Show your furry friends how special they are by ordering them a custom handmade etched copper ID tag!

Your pet's name is carefully hand drawn onto 18g copper in a whimsical, retro style, featuring stars in the background. The special pen used for the drawing acts as a resist for the etching process, so that the background is etched away, leaving the name and design standing out! A blackening patina is used in the background, and then the raised design is cleaned and brightened so that it really stands out! The tag is cut into an oval or circular shape - the length of your pet's name determines the shape and size of each tag. 
*** Please keep in mind that if your pet's name is long, the tag will be larger. We generally try to keep tag sizes appropriate to your pet's size, but a Chihuahua named "Mister Cucaracha" might warrant a larger tag than chihuahuas might normally wear. Same goes for a kitty called "Princess Fluffinstein." <3


Here's how it works:
You pick the tag design you like, and go ahead and click "Add to Cart." When the paypal order form comes up, there will be a section called "Note to Seller." Here is where you tell us your dog's name - please double check to be sure spelling is correct!!! - and the type and size of your furry friend, so we can get a good idea of the size of tag we need to shoot for. -- This section appears after you get to the paypal screen, but if you don't see it or want to be doubly sure, just send us a message with your pet's info in the "contact" section of the site.  Make sure to include your name, too, so we'll know who gets what!

This product listing is for one pet ID tag in the "Starlite" design. Each tag is custom made to order, so each one will be as unique as your buddy! Your tag will arrive ready-to-wear with a split ring already attached. Please allow 7-10 days for your tag to arrive! 

At your request, we will hand engrave your phone number onto the back of your pet's tag free of charge! Include this in the "Notes to Seller" section of your order form along with your pet's name and size. 

Please keep in mind that over time, the bright copper part of the tag might dull a little, but if you want to brighten it up again, just rub a little fine sandpaper (400 grit works great) or steel wool over the top, and it should shine right back up!


10% of proceeds from each sale will be donated to local animal rescue organizations! We love our pets, and want to spread the love around! 

We thank you for your purchase, and so do all the sweet pets you've helped by buying your pet ID tag from CopperDog Studio!

name: Custom Handmade Copper Enamel Pet ID Tag - Blue
description:
Extra special bling for your extra special pet!

Your pet's name is carefully hand drawn onto 16g copper in a whimsical style, featuring stars and dots in the background. The special pen used for the drawing acts as a resist for the etching process, so that the background is etched away.  The recesses are filled with a vibrant blue enamel which is fused to the copper in a kiln. 
The tag is cut into an oval or circular shape - the length of your pet's name determines the shape and size of each tag. 
*** Please keep in mind that if your pet's name is long, the tag will be larger. We generally try to keep tag sizes appropriate to your pet's size, but a Chihuahua named "Don Juan de Marco" might warrant a larger tag than chihuahuas might normally wear. Same goes for a kitty called "Princess Fluffinstein." <3

Here's how it works: 
You pick the tag design you like, and go ahead and click "Add to Cart." When the paypal order form comes up, there will be a section called "Note to Seller." Here is where you tell us your dog's name - please double check to be sure spelling is correct!!! - and the type and size of your furry friend, so we can get a good idea of the size of tag we need to shoot for. -- This section appears after you get to the paypal screen, but if you don't see it or want to be doubly sure, just send us a message with your pet's info in the "contact" section of the site. Make sure to include your name, too, so we'll know who gets what!

This product listing is for one pet ID tag in Blue Enamel. You can choose Dark Blue, Aqua Blue, or two-tone as shown here.  Each tag is custom made to order, so each one will be as unique as your buddy! Your tag will arrive ready-to-wear with a split ring already attached. Please allow 7-10 days for your tag to arrive!

At your request, we will hand engrave your phone number onto the back of your pet's tag free of charge! Include this in the "Notes to Seller" section of your order form along with your pet's name and size.

Please keep in mind that enamel is glass.  If your pet is very active and wears other metal tags, you might want to think about a regular etched tag without enamel, as there is a possibility that the enamel could crack or chip. For any copper tag, over time, the bright copper part of the tag might dull a little, but if you want to brighten it up again, just rub steel wool over the top, and it should shine right back up!


10% of proceeds from each sale will be donated to local animal rescue organizations! We love our pets, and want to spread the love around!

We thank you for your purchase, and so do all the sweet pets you've helped by buying your pet ID tag from CopperDog Studio!

name: Fully Customizable Handmade Etched Copper Enamel Pet ID Tag
description:
Extra special bling for your extra special pet! And now you get to pick exactly what you want from all the styles and enamel colors we have available in our studio!

Styles available include "starlite," "script," "minimalist," "bubbles," and "toothy," which can be seen in other listings in our shop. 
See the last photo in this listing for all available enamel colors - choose a solid color or a combination of any two colors for a fun two-tone tag.

Your pet's name is carefully hand drawn onto 16g copper in a fun style. The special pen used for the drawing acts as a resist for the etching process, so that the background is etched away. The recesses are filled with a vibrant enamel color of your choice, which is fused to the copper in a kiln. 
The tag is cut into an oval or circular shape - the length of your pet's name determines the shape and size of each tag. 
*** Please keep in mind that if your pet's name is long, the tag will be larger. We generally try to keep tag sizes appropriate to your pet's size, but a Chihuahua named "Don Juan de Marco" might warrant a larger tag than chihuahuas might normally wear. Same goes for a kitty called "Princess Fluffinstein." <3

Here's how it works: 
You pick the tag design you like, and go ahead and click "Add to Cart." When the paypal order form comes up, there will be a section called "Note to Seller." Here is where you tell us the style and color(s) you've picked for your new tag! Also use this box to tell us your dog's name - please double check to be sure spelling is correct!!! - and the type and size of your furry friend, so we can get a good idea of the size of tag we need to shoot for. 

This product listing is for one pet ID tag in your choice of style and enamel color. Each tag is custom made to order, so each one will be as unique as your buddy! Your tag will arrive ready-to-wear with a split ring already attached. Please allow 7-10 days for your tag to arrive!

At your request, we will etch your phone number onto the back of your pet's tag free of charge! Include this in the "Notes to Seller" section of your order form along with your pet's name and size.

Please keep in mind that enamel is glass.  If your pet is very active and wears other metal tags, you might want to think about a regular etched tag without enamel, as there is a possibility that the enamel could crack or chip. For any copper tag, over time, the bright copper part of the tag might dull a little, but if you want to brighten it up again, just rub steel wool over the top, and it should shine right back up!


10% of proceeds from each sale will be donated to local animal rescue organizations! We love our pets, and want to spread the love around!

We thank you for your purchase, and so do all the sweet pets you've helped by buying your pet ID tag from CopperDog Studio!

name: Custom Handmade Enameled Copper Christmas Ornament - Cut-Out with Your Pet's Name
description:
A beautiful handcrafted eneameled pierced copper ornament for the pet-lover in your life!

Each ornament is made to order with your dog's name hand drawn in a whimsical style onto 20g copper sheet and then cut out, or "pierced," with a jeweler's hand saw. It is then enameled by hand - choose from white, red, blue, aqua, marigold orange, or light green (Aqua shown). Choose an option above or let us know in the "Notes to Seller" section of the paypal order form. Each ornament is oval-shaped, approximately 3" x 2." So what you get a unique handcrafted piece of art for your tree or home! 

(Yes, we'll do your child or grandchild's name, too.)

How it works : If you like this style, go ahead and click "Add to Cart." When the paypal order form comes up, there will be a section called "Notes to Seller." Here is where you tell us your pet's name. ***Please double check to make sure spelling is correct!!!

10% of proceeds from each sale will be donated to local animal rescue organizations! We love our pets, and want to spread the love around!

We thank you for your purchase, and so do all the sweet pets you've helped by buying your ornament from CopperDog Studio!

name: Custom Handmade Enamel Copper Christmas Ornament - I Heart My Pet
description:
A beautiful handcrafted pierced and enameled copper ornament for the pet-lover in your life!

Each ornament is made to order so that you can specify whether you want it to say "I heart my dog," "dogs," "cat," "cats," "ferret," or "iguanas!" Just let us know in the "Notes to Seller" section of the order form! 

The design is hand drawn onto 20g copper sheet and then cut out, or "pierced," with a jeweler's hand saw. It is then enameled by hand - choose from white, red, blue, aqua, marigold orange, or light green. Just let us know in the "Notes to Seller" section of the paypal order form. You can also choose a second color for the heart if you like! Shown is white with a red heart. Each ornament is oval-shaped, approximately 3" x 2." So what you get is a unique handcrafted piece of art for your tree or home! 

10% of proceeds from each sale will be donated to local animal rescue organizations! We love our pets, and want to spread the love around!

We thank you for your purchase, and so do all the sweet pets you've helped by buying your ornament from CopperDog Studio!

name: Custom Handmade Copper Christmas Ornament - I Heart My Pet
description:
A beautiful handcrafted pierced copper ornament for the pet-lover in your life!

Each ornament is made to order so that you can specify whether you want it to say "I heart my dog," "dogs," "cat," "cats," "ferret," or "iguanas!" Just let us know in the "Notes to Seller" section of the order form! 

The design is hand drawn onto 20g copper sheet and then cut out, or "pierced," with a jeweler's hand saw, so that you get a unique handcrafted piece of art for your tree or home! Each ornament is oval-shaped, approximately 3" x 2." We also treat the copper with a lacquer coating so that it will remain bright and shiny and won't oxidize over time. If you prefer the oxidized copper look, just let us know!

10% of proceeds from each sale will be donated to local animal rescue organizations! We love our pets, and want to spread the love around!

We thank you for your purchase, and so do all the sweet pets you've helped by buying your ornament from CopperDog Studio!

name: Custom Handmade Etched Copper Dog ID Tag - Minimalist Design
description:
Show your furry friends how special they are by ordering them a custom handmade etched copper ID tag!

Your pet's name is carefully hand drawn onto 18g copper in a whimsical, yet minimalist style, featuring stripes or dots in the background. (You can specify your preference or leave it up to us!) The special pen used for the drawing acts as a resist for the etching process, so that the background is etched away, leaving the name and design standing out! A blackening patina is used in the background, and then the raised design is cleaned and brightened so that it really stands out! The tag is cut into an oval or circular shape - the length of your pet's name determines the shape and size of each tag. 
*** Please keep in mind that if your pet's name is long, the tag will be larger. We generally try to keep tag sizes appropriate to your pet's size, but a Chihuahua named "Senor Yippster" might warrant a larger tag than chihuahuas might normally wear. Same goes for a cat called "Baron von Kittlesworth." <3

Here's how it works:
You pick the tag design you like, and go ahead and click "Add to Cart." When the paypal order form comes up, there will be a section called "Note to Seller." Here is where you tell us your dog's name - please double check to be sure spelling is correct!!! - and the type and size of your furry friend, so we can get a good idea of the size of tag we need to shoot for. -- This section appears after you get to the paypal screen, but if you don't see it or want to be doubly sure, just send us a message with your pet's info in the "contact" section of the site.  Make sure to include your name, too, so we'll know who gets what!



This listing is for one pet ID tag in the "Minimalist" design. Each tag is custom made to order, so each one will be as unique as your buddy! Your tag will arrive ready-to-wear with a split ring already attached. Please allow 7-10 days for your tag to arrive! 

At your request, we will hand engrave your phone number onto the back of your pet's tag free of charge! Include this in the "Notes to Seller" section of your order form along with your pet's name and size. 

Please keep in mind that over time, the bright copper part of the tag might dull a little, but if you want to brighten it up again, just rub a little fine sandpaper (400 grit works great) or steel wool over the top, and it should shine right back up!



10% of proceeds from each sale will be donated to local animal rescue organizations! We love our pets, and want to spread the love around! 

We thank you for your purchase, and so do all the sweet pets you've helped by buying your pet ID tag from CopperDog Studio!

Make sure to include your name, too, so we'll know who gets what!

This product listing is for one pet ID tag in the "Toothy" design. Each tag is custom made to order, so each one will be as unique as your buddy! Your tag will arrive ready-to-wear with a split ring already attached. Please allow 7-10 days for your tag to arrive! 

At your request, we will etch your phone number onto the back of your pet's tag free of charge! Include this in the "Notes to Seller" section of your order form along with your pet's name and size. 

Please keep in mind that over time, the bright copper part of the tag might dull a little, but if you want to brighten it up again, just rub a little fine sandpaper (400 grit works great) or steel wool over the top, and it should shine right back up!


10% of proceeds from each sale will be donated to local animal rescue organizations! We love our pets, and want to spread the love around! 

We thank you for your purchase, and so do all the sweet pets you've helped by buying your pet ID tag from CopperDog Studio!

name: Handmade Etched Copper Pet Portrait - 4"x6"
description:
Capture your best friend's lovable personality in a permanent, archival etched copper portrait!

Here's how it works:
Add this item to your cart in either size that you choose: 4"x6" or 5"x7." When we receive the order, we'll contact you through email, and ask you to send us a photograph of your pet.  

High resolution images work best, so please send images that are 6 megapixels or higher (no camera phone images please.)  It also helps if there is a relatively clean background. We'll remove most background noise in the editing process, but the less there is, the sharper the image of your buddy will be.  And that's what we want, right?  

So once we have your pet's photo, we can begin the process.  We use photoshop to edit the image into one that we can etch.  Then we transfer the image onto an 18 gauge copper plate.  The printed image acts as a resist for the etching process, which can take up to 8 hours, depending on the size and image to be etched.  Once the etching is done, we clean it up and use a blackening patina, so that the recessed areas that have been etched away are darker, creating a beautiful contrast where the natural color of the copper comes through.  

Due to the nature of the process, please allow 2-3 weeks for delivery.  Your portrait will be shipped to you in a simple black frame, ready to be displayed in your home.  It's a wonderful tribute to your best friend!
